Class DiscreteFourierTransform

java.lang.Object
DiscreteTransform
DiscreteFourierTransform
public class DiscreteFourierTransform
extends DiscreteTransform
Since:
06-12-2020 Midterm Project - 161044036 It is the class used to indicate Discrete Fourier Transforms. It derives from DiscreteTransform class.
Author:
Furkan Ozev
